scripts.build: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o dist/css/style.min.css css/style.css && cleancss -o dist/admin/css/admin.min.css admin/css/admin.css
scripts.minify-js: terser js/script.js -o dist/js/script.min.js --compress --mangle && terser js/github-api.js -o dist/js/github-api.min.js --compress --mangle && terser admin/js/admin-main.js -o dist/admin/js/admin-main.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.prepare-deploy: npm run build && ncp index.html dist/ && ncp data dist/ && ncp admin dist/ && ncp assets dist/
